channel.title: Paths on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Paths on ZooBerry

item.title: Galaxy Theme Pack
item.description: A galaxy theme pack for your zoo. Includes a path, wall, trashcan, and bench.

item.title: Granite Theme Pack
item.description: A granite theme pack for your zoo. Includes a grounded and elevated path with matching wall.

item.title: Green Series Theme Pack
item.description: A green series theme pack for your zoo. Includes a fence, paths, picnic table, umbrella table, viewing canopy, trash can, bench, and arch.

item.title: Lion Theme Pack
item.description: A lion theme pack for your zoo. Includes a fence, path, and wall.

item.title: Nebula Theme Pack
item.description: A nebula theme pack for your zoo. Includes a path, wall, trashcan, and bench.

item.title: Purple Haze Theme Pack
item.description: Purple Haze theme pack for your zoo. Includes a path, wall, trashcan, and bench.

item.title: School Dayz Theme Pack
item.description: School Dayz theme pack for your zoo. Includes an arch, bench, canopy, fence, path, picnic table, trashcan, and umbrella table.

item.title: Boardwalk Theme Pack
item.description: I made a Boardwalk Fence to go with the boardwalk path and elevated path, it’s usable with or without any expansions. Hope all enjoy.

item.title: Dragon Theme Pack
item.description: A dragon theme pack for your zoo. Includes a fence, path, and wall.

item.title: Aquatic Adventure Pack
item.description: Aquatic Adventure Pack featuring paths, gazebos, restaurants, and more.

item.title: Chinese Character Path Pack
item.description: A set of two paths with Chinese characters for your zoo.

item.title: Doooot's Animal Print Path Pack
item.description: A pack of 33 animal print paths for ZT2.

item.title: Doooot's Danish Paths Pack
item.description: A Danish-themed path pack.

item.title: Doooot's Mixed Paths Pack
item.description: A mixed pack of 18 paths for ZT2.

item.title: Doooot's Mixed Paths Pack 2
item.description: A mixed pack of nine paths for ZT2.

item.title: Halloween Scenery Pack
item.description: Halloween Scenery Pack with paths, canopies, and more.

item.title: Honor Halloween Path Pack
item.description: A set of four Halloween-themed paths for your zoos.

item.title: Japanese Mini Pack
item.description: A Japanese-themed pack with paths and objects for your zoo.

item.title: Paths
item.description: Pave new roads for your guests to walk on.

item.title: Purple Pack
item.description: A purple-themed pack with various decorative objects.

item.title: RedNotDead Crazy Path Pack
item.description: A pack of 10 colorful and crazy paths.

item.title: Snow Tiger Easter Contest Pack 1
item.description: Snow Tigers Easter Contest Pack 1 with Easter-themed objects.

item.title: Snow Tiger Easter Pack 2
item.description: Snow Tigers Easter Contest Pack 2 with Easter-themed objects and animals.

item.title: Snow Tigers Special Theme Pack
item.description: Snow Tigers Special Theme Pack with paths, fences, and more.

item.title: Valentine Pack
item.description: A Valentine-themed pack featuring paths, balloons, a gazebo, animals, and more.

item.title: YR ZT 2 Path Pack 1
item.description: A pack of nine paths to beautify your zoos.

item.title: Butterfly Path
item.description: A path decorated with multicolored butterflies.

item.title: Chrome Path
item.description: A chrome-colored path for a modern look.

item.title: Fall Leaves Path
item.description: A path decorated with autumn leaves.

item.title: Gravel Path
item.description: A gravelly path for your zoo guests.

item.title: YR St Patty's Day Path
item.description: A St. Patty’s Day path.

item.title: Zoo Admin Anniversary Path
item.description: A path celebrating Zoo Admin’s 5th anniversary.

item.title: T'ni's Halloween Path Pack
item.description: A spooky Halloween-themed path collection created by T’ni.

item.title: Island Excursions
item.description: Embark upon an excursion to travel the oceans in search of tropical paradise! Discover the isles hiding within the Hawaiian Islands and Papua New Guinea, seeing such animals as the Hawaiian Monk Seal and the Northern Cassowary as they live in their lush and vibrant homes.

item.title: Sea Predator Path
item.description: This path is part of the Predators of the Seas Expanion Pack, and was the first non-animal and non-biome item created for it.

item.title: Nocturnal Pack
item.description: A pack of nocturnal-themed objects by Feral Designs.

item.title: Alpine Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Boreal Forest Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Elements Pack
item.description: This is a scenery pack from the creative minds of Penguinman and Budgielover101.

item.title: Savannah Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Temperate Forest Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Tundra Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Crumbling Dark Brick Pack
item.description: Dark crumbling bricks are a perfect path for Halloween themed areas of your zoos. Original skin by genkicoll for ZT1, converted to ZT2 by ShenTirag.

item.title: Genkicoll's ZT1 Paths for ZT2 Pack
item.description: A selection of genkicoll’s wonderful paths that she has made for ZT1, replicated with permission for use in ZT2. Enjoy wooden, sandstone, shadowstone and other paths in your zoos!

item.title: Leafy Path
item.description: A path covered in newly fallen leaves, featuring leaf decorations along the curb as well. Perfect for a walk through temperate forests!

item.title: Natural Scenery Pack 1
item.description: The first of two sets aimed towards creating more realistic zoos, and my first ever user-made pack for Zoo Tycoon 2! Featuring three paths (two bark chip and one stone path), two topiaries and a bench.

item.title: The Christmas Pack
item.description: Merry Christmas! The Christmas Pack is a collection of mods for Zoo Tycoon 2 that expound a winter theme.

item.title: Zoo Tycoon 2: Operation Genesis - Part 1
item.description: A pack containing various buildings, scenery and foliage imported from JPOG.

item.title: European Expeditions [Realistic]
item.description: A user-made expansion pack made by Hendrix!

item.title: REPTILIA
item.description: Reptilia is a new expansion pack made by ZT ABC!

item.title: Shen's Path Pack
item.description: A pack with 12 new paths!

item.title: Sandstone Theme
item.description: The Sandstone Theme Pack contains items made of softly coloured sandstone, often overgrown with ivy.

item.title: Aboriginal Australian Pack
item.description: Includes a high and low fence, an arch, a path, and a kangaroo statue.

item.title: Coastal Theme Pack
item.description: A coastal theme pack by ShenTirag.

item.title: Colored Path Pack
item.description: This pack contains 14 wonderful colors of path to add a delightful touch to your zoo.

item.title: Zoomania Path
item.description: This path was designed for the ZooMania 100 Member Celebration Party.
